alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:12PM CDT until August 07 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Randolph County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Cleburne County in east central Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 412 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abernathy, or 13 miles east of Heflin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ranburne, Fruithurst, Muscadine, Abernathy, Trickem, Graham, I 20 Welcome Center and Newell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
